summary: A university is an institution where teaching and research is done.
full_text:
The University of Wales  was a confederal university based in Cardiff, Wales, UK. It was founded in 1893, and in 2011 it announced its intention to merge with University of Wales Trinity Saint David. In the meantime it has continued to function in its own right.
In its heyday it accredited institutions throughout Wales, and validated courses at institutions in Britain and abroad, with over 100,000 students.
title: University of Wales
